description:
She specializes in attack magic, and she belonged to the Mage Guild in the game.
In the current world, she changed jobs from a court mage to a professor at the Royal Academy. When it comes to her trying to quell her older brother Skargo`s aesthetics and absolute devotion to their mother, they end up in a huge magical fight, but Mai-Mai also loves her mother very much and wants to be coddled.
Source: Official site
name: Mai-Mai
